rules_text:
This spell costs {2} less to cast if an opponent was dealt combat damage this turn.
When Dastardly Duo enters the battlefield, audition for black. [i](Create a 1/1 Construct Actor creature token, a Cleric Role giving 2/2 and lifelink, or a Warlock Role giving 2/1 and flying. Roles replace older ones.)[/i]
